name: Monkey Business (itch) (KnightKnight28)
description:
You have to search and rescue fellow test subject Monkeys on a Spaceship since you are the cleverest Monkey onboard! :)

3 Significant modifications:

1.) Created a spike obstacle that can hurt the player.

2.) Changed player to a monkey and re-created the animations.

3.) Added a complete comprehensive level 3.

Created by: Roelie du Plessis

Contents obtained from: MSU
